attributes.additional_details: I'm struggling to pay it myself and no help what so ever. All I get is this is the amount to pay and you must pay it. This needs to change.
attributes.background: This petition is for the change in how child maintenance is worked out. currently they just take a percentage of gross earnings but don't take any other outgoings into consideration, I.e. rent, household bills, shopping etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like child maintenance to be calculated.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
